Key Match Events: The Denver Nuggets fell 102-87 to the Oklahoma City Thunder in their season opener on October 25, 2024.
Nikola Jokić had a strong performance, scoring 16 points on 6-of-13 shooting while also adding 13 rebounds and 12 assists.
Post-Match Reflections: Nikola Jokić expressed that the team is not a good shooting team outside of Michael Porter Jr. and Jamal Murray.
Nuggets coach Michael Malone acknowledged shooting as a concern but emphasized there is no need for panic at this early stage of the season.
